title: Trump-DeSantis Rift Grows, With Dueling Rallies and Name-Calling
description: The Republican Party’s top two stars are campaigning, separately, in the midterms’ last days.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender and Patricia Mazzei
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: On Saturday in Pennsylvania, Donald J. Trump held a rally for Republicans. On Sunday in Florida, Mr. Trump and Ron DeSantis held separate campaign rallies.
